description: Navigate to Onoe-cho. Walk down the narrow street, passing the TM-43 Building on your right, until you reach the T-intersection with the main road. Turn right onto the wide avenue (Kamakura Kaido). The destination will be on the right side, near the Onoe-cho bus stop.
agent_refined_route: Head northwest on the narrow street [64m] -> Turn right onto the main road [15m]
agent_concise_description: Walk down the narrow street, passing the TM-43 Building on your right, until you reach the T-intersection with the main road. Turn right onto the wide avenue (Kamakura Kaido). The destination will be on the right side, near the Onoe-cho bus stop.
